content:
{
    "source_filename": "AnimationClipProvider.yaml",
    "metadata": {},
    "content": "# This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
# To submit a bug report on the content, see
# https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: AnimationClipProvider
type: class
memory_category: Animation
summary: |
  Provides functions to load and preview `Class.AnimationClip|AnimationClips`.
description: |
  Provides functions to load and preview `Class.AnimationClip|AnimationClips`.
  It includes a number of functions that are useful when working with an
  `Class.Animation`.

  The `Class.AnimationClipProvider` replaces the deprecated
  `Class.KeyframeSequenceProvider` that was used to download `KeyframeSequences`
  by content ID.

  The AnimationClipProvider has a number of uses.

  - Download the `Class.AnimationClip` associated with an animation content ID
    from the Roblox website, regardless of the underlying type of
    `Class.AnimationClip` (`Class.KeyframeSequence` or `Class.CurveAnimation`).
  - Generate a temporary ID to locally preview an animation.
  - Fetch the content IDs of animations owned by a particular user.
code_samples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - Service
  - NotReplicated
deprecation_message: ''
properties: []
methods:
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetAnimationClip
    summary: |
      Returns a `Class.AnimationClip` from a given asset URL.
    description: |
      Returns a `Class.AnimationClip` from a given asset URL.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: assetId
        type: ContentId
        default:
        summary: |
          The content ID of the animation.
    returns:
      - type: AnimationClip
        summary: |
          The `Class.AnimationClip` found.
    tags:
      - Deprecated
    deprecation_message: |
      This function is deprecated and can lead to the game freezing until the
      animation is loaded. Developers are recommended to use
      `GetAnimationClipAsync` instead.
    security: PluginSecurity
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetAnimationClipAsync
    summary: |
      Returns a `Class.AnimationClip` based on the specified assetId
      asynchronously.
    description: |
      Fetches an `Class.AnimationClip` based on the specified assetId. The
      assetId must correspond to an animation asset in Roblox. The function will
      yield until the `Class.AnimationClip` is loaded from the website and
      should be wrapped in a `pcall`.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: assetId
        type: ContentId
        default:
        summary: |
          The content ID of the animation.
    returns:
      - type: AnimationClip
        summary: |
          The `Class.AnimationClip` found.
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetAnimationClipById
    summary: |
      Returns a `Class.AnimationClip` from the supplied assetId.
    description: |
      Returns a `Class.AnimationClip` from the supplied assetId. Can optionally
      cache to reduce unnecessary loading freezes.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: assetId
        type: int64
        default:
        summary: |
          The content ID of the animation.
      - name: useCache
        type: boolean
        default:
        summary: |
          True if a cached version can be returned.
    returns:
      - type: AnimationClip
        summary: |
          The `Class.AnimationClip` found.
    tags:
      - Deprecated
    deprecation_message: |
      This function is deprecated and can lead to the game freezing until the
      animation is loaded. Developers are recommended to use
      `GetAnimationClipAsync` instead.
    security: PluginSecurity
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetAnimationsAsync
    summary: |
      This function returns an `Class.InventoryPages` object which can be used
      to iterate over animations owned by a specific user.
    description: |
      This function returns an `Class.InventoryPages` object which can be used
      to iterate over animations owned by a specific user.

      This function has a number of potential uses, such as allowing users to
      browse and import animations into a custom animation plugin.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: userId
        type: int64
        default:
        summary: |
          The user ID of the user.
    returns:
      - type: Instance
        summary: |
          An `Class.InventoryPages` of animations.
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetAnimations
    summary: |
      This function returns an `Class.InventoryPages` object which can be used
      to iterate over animations owned by a specific user.
    description: ''
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: userId
        type: int64
        default:
        summary: |
          The user ID of the user.
    returns:
      - type: Instance
        summary: |
          An `Class.InventoryPages` of animations.
    tags:
      - Yields
      - Deprecated
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:GetClipEvaluatorAsync
    summary: ''
    description: ''
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: assetId
        type: ContentId
        default:
        summary: ''
    returns:
      - type: ClipEvaluator
        summary: ''
    tags:
      - Yields
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:RegisterActiveAnimationClip
    summary: |
      Generates a temporary asset ID from a `Class.AnimationClip` that can be
      used for localized testing of an animation.
    description: |
      Generates a temporary asset ID from a `Class.AnimationClip` that can be
      used for localized testing of an animation. This performs the same
      function as
      `Class.AnimationClipProvider:RegisterAnimationClip()|RegisterAnimationClip()`
      but generates an `active://` URL instead of a hash. The generated ID can
      be used as an `Class.Animation.AnimationId|AnimationId` property for
      testing.

      The asset ID generated by this function is temporary and cannot be used
      outside of Studio. Developers wishing to generate an asset ID that can be
      used online should upload the `Class.AnimationClip` to Roblox.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: animationClip
        type: AnimationClip
        default:
        summary: |
          The `Class.AnimationClip` to be used.
    returns:
      - type: ContentId
        summary: |
          A temporary asset ID generated for localized animation playback.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
  - name: AnimationClipProvider:RegisterAnimationClip
    summary: |
      Generates a temporary asset ID from a `Class.AnimationClip` that can be
      used for localized testing of an animation. Generates a hash.
    description: |
      Generates a temporary asset ID from a `Class.AnimationClip` that can be
      used for localized testing of an animation.

      This function performs the same function to
      `Class.AnimationClipProvider:RegisterActiveAnimationClip()|RegisterActiveAnimationClip`
      yet generates a hash instead of an `active://` URL.

      The ID generated can be used for the `Class.Animation.AnimationId`
      property to test animations.

      The asset ID generated by this function is temporary and cannot be used
      outside of Studio. Developers wishing to generate an asset ID that can be
      used online should upload the `Class.AnimationClip` to Roblox.
    code_samples: []
    parameters:
      - name: animationClip
        type: AnimationClip
        default:
        summary: |
          The `Class.AnimationClip` to be used.
    returns:
      - type: ContentId
        summary: |
          A temporary asset ID generated for localized animation playback.
    tags: []
    deprecation_message: ''
    security: None
    thread_safety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - Animation
events: []
callbacks: []"
}
